name: Neuvillette
storytext: He who looks down on all that are haughty.
source: Reward for inviting Neuvillette to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: O Tears, I Shall Repay
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, creates 1 Sourcewater Droplet.

skills.name: O Tides, I Have Returned
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby, then creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112101]</color> with 2 Usages.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>, deals 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color></color> to all opposing characters on standby, then creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sourcewater Droplet</color> with 2 Usages.
skills.description: Deals 2 Hydro DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, then creates a Sourcewater Droplet with 2 Usages.

skills.name: Equitable Judgment
skills.descriptionraw: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 $[K5] to themselves and deal +1 DMG.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to themselves and deal +1 DMG.
skills.description:
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 Hydro DMG. If character has at least 6 HP, then they deal 1 Piercing DMG to themselves and deal +1 DMG.
